Package controllers

Class VehiclePickupController

java.lang.Object
controllers.VehiclePickupController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientAware
public class VehiclePickupController extends Object implements ClientAware
Handles the "Retrieve Vehicle" flow at the terminal. Step 1 ג€“ subscriber proves identity (manual code or RFID tag). Step 2 ג€“ subscriber enters the six-digit parking code to release the car.

  • Method Details

    • setClient

      public void setClient(ClientController client)
      Injects the ClientController and registers this controller instance inside it.
      Specified by:
      setClient in interface ClientAware
      Parameters:
      client - active ClientController

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the screen ג€“ hides the second step (parking code input) until the subscriber is verified.

    • getStatusLabel

      public Label getStatusLabel()
      Returns:
      the label used for showing system status messages

    • validateSubscriber

      public void validateSubscriber()
      Triggered when the user clicks "Next" to verify their subscriber code. Performs local validation (numeric check) before sending the code to the server.

    • handleReadTag

      public void handleReadTag()
      Triggered when the user clicks "Read Tag" to validate via RFID. Sends the tag ID to the server after checking that itג€™s not empty.

    • onSubscriberValidated

      public void onSubscriberValidated()
      Called after the server confirms subscriber identity via manual code. Locks the first step and reveals the second.

    • collectCar

      public void collectCar()
      Called when the user clicks "Collect Car". Validates the parking code input and sends the request to the server. Only 6-digit numeric codes (between 100000 and 999999) are allowed. If the input is invalid or too long, we show a friendly message.

    • forgotMyCode

      public void forgotMyCode()
      Triggered when the user clicks "I Lost My Code". Sends a request to the server to resend the confirmation code.

    • onSubscriberValidated

      public void onSubscriberValidated(int subscriberCode)
      Called when the server confirms RFID-based validation.
      Parameters:
      subscriberCode - numeric code returned by the server

    • lockAfterValidation

      private void lockAfterValidation()
      Unlocks the second step and disables the first step (identity fields).

    • disableAfterPickup

      public void disableAfterPickup()
      Called after successful vehicle pickup. Disables all controls to prevent reuse.

    • resetParkingCodeField

      public void resetParkingCodeField()
      Clears the parking code field and puts the cursor back inside it, so the user can easily try again.
